meanings.sent1: The owl nictates slowly in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: She nictates when she is trying to keep a secret.
meanings.sent3: The robot nictates to signal that it understood the command.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse nictates, guiding ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: His eyelids nictate rapidly when he is nervous.

meanings.sent1: The nictates firefly lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her nictates eyes showed her amusement.
meanings.sent3: The nictates light on the modem indicated a connection.
meanings.sent4: The nictates stars seemed to twinkle in approval.
meanings.sent5: The nictates headlights of the car signaled a turn.
